t=input()
while t!=0:
    n,c=raw_input().split(' ')
    n=int(n)
    c=int(c)
    s=0
    flag=0
    d=1
    first=0
    last=0
    while d<=2:
        first=(2*c-n*(n-1)*d)/(2*n)
        if first<1:
            flag=0
            break
        
        last=first+(n-1)*d
        s=n*(first + last)/2
        
        if s==c:
            flag=1
            break
            
        d=d+1
    
    if flag==0:
        print "No"
    
    else:
        print "Yes"

    t=t-1
